projectGridLines.title: Fullstack Development
projectGridLines.description:
Skill sets:

1.    Good Understanding of Programming Concepts (Syntax and Logic)

2.    Basic understanding of NodeJS or Javascript.

3.    Any experience with NoSQL(MongoDB) and React is a plus.

4.    Excellent problem-solving, communication, and time-management skills

5.    Interest, willingness and demonstrated ability to learn new programming languages as necessary

6.    Ability to work with a great deal of autonomy, as well as in a team environment.

Passion for coding.

projectGridLines.title: Data Engineering
projectGridLines.description:
Skill sets:

1.    Must Be an extremely Curious Individual, keen on actively participating, never settling and trying to learn new things.

2.    Data Structures and Algorithms is a must have skill.

3.    Knowledge of Python, SQL, shell script is mandatory and Javascript (Node.js) is good to have.

4.    Knowledge of multiple cloud storage options like S3, Redshift, or Bigquery is good to have.

5.    Should be well versed with MySQL and have a working idea about NoSQL.

6.    Knowledge of Pandas and Spark is a must.

7.    Knowledge of Big data.

8.    Knowledge of streaming services like AWS streams / Kafka / Google Pub/sub is good to have.

9.    Knowledge of Queue systems like Rabbit MQ, SQS and assisting in building pipelines is an added bonus.

10.  Knowledge on Dockers, Kubernetes is good to have.

11.  Familiarity with multiple cloud providers (AWS, Azure & GCP) is good to have.

Masters or Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science or the equivalent in experience.
